articles.title: European Union and Mercosur bloc sign landmark free trade agreement - PBS
articles.description: The EU and the Mercosur bloc of South American countries formally signed a long-sought landmark free trade agreement on Saturday, capping more than 25 years of negotiations to strengthen commercial ties in the face of rising protectionism and global trade ten…
articles.content: ASUNCIÓN, Paraguay (AP) The European Union and the Mercosur bloc of South American countries formally signed a long-sought landmark free trade agreement on Saturday, capping more than a quarter-centu… [+4695 chars]
